entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
